panels.description: Number of active controllers in the cluster.
panels.title: Active Controllers

panels.description: Number of partitions that don?t have an active leader and are hence not writable or readable.
panels.title: Offline Partitions Count

panels.description: Number of partitions which are at their minimum in sync replica count (| ISR | == | min.insync.replicas |).
panels.title: Partitions at mininimum ISR

panels.description: Number of partitions which are under their minimum in sync replica count (| ISR | < | min.insync.replicas |).
panels.title: Partitions under mininimum ISR

panels.description: Number of Zookeeper leaders in the cluster. It should always be 1
panels.title: ZK Leaders

panels.description: Number of unhealthy kafka nodes in envoy proxy
panels.title: Envoy Unhealthy Kafka

panels.description: CruiseControl unfixable goals requires manual intervention to Kafka. Check CC to see what goal fails to be self-healed
panels.title: CC Unfixable Goals

panels.description: Total number of consumer groups in cluster
panels.title: Consumer Groups

panels.description: Replication IN + OUT across the entire cluster
panels.title: Total Cluster Replication Rate

panels.description: Message Conversations performed by broker due to message protocol mismatch on client side.
panels.title: Message Conversion Rate

panels.description: Top 10 topics wrt to number of segments per broker
panels.title: Topic Segments #

panels.description: Shows the disk in cluster which are over-used - (size wise) compared to avg on that broker

targets.expr:
sum by(broker,persistentvolumeclaim) (label_replace ( (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{namespace="$kubernetes_namespace",persistentvolumeclaim=~"pipeline-kafka.*"}), "broker", "$1", "persistentvolumeclaim", "pipeline-kafka-([0-9]+)-.+"))

  < on (broker) group_left()

  (
0.8 * avg by (broker)(sum by(broker,persistentvolumeclaim) (label_replace ( (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{namespace="$kubernetes_namespace",persistentvolumeclaim=~"pipeline-kafka.*"}), "broker", "$1", "persistentvolumeclaim", "pipeline-kafka-([0-9]+)-.+")))

  )

panels.title: Unbalanced disks in kafka cluster

targets.expr: sum (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", service="prometheus-kube-state-metrics", namespace="$kubernetes_namespace", resource="memory", pod=~"$cluster_name-$kafka_broker", container=~"kafka"}) by(pod,container)

panels.description: Aggregated Kafka Broker Pods CPU Usage
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Kafka Broker Pods Disk Usage (Aggregated by broker)
panels.title: Disk Usage (Broker distribution)
